html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-07862024-06-21PPC
ActCanadian Transportation Accident Investigation and Safety Board Act
PrecisRe-appointment of YOAN MARIER of Saint-Lazare, Quebec, as a full-time member and Chairperson of the Canadian Transportation Accident Investigation and Safety Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending on August 20, 2028, effective September 28, 2024 and his designation as Chairperson of the Canadian Transportation Accident Investigation Board, for a term of four years, effective August 21, 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Re-appointment of YOAN MARIER of Saint-Lazare, Quebec, as a full-time member and Chairperson of the Canadian Transportation Accident Investigation and Safety Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending on August 20, 2028, effective September 28, 2024 and his designation as Chairperson of the Canadian Transportation Accident Investigation Board, for a term of four years, effective August 21, 2024.
